bug.author: lucmos
bug.summary: Echo doesn't echo all methods of class
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Some methods of a class defined inside the echo scope aren't echoed <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Not working</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11019190/70231716-2648f600-175b-11ea-929e-4d4f0cecee78.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Working</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11019190/70231754-3a8cf300-175b-11ea-82a1-8932280064f8.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
All the code inside the echo scope should be echoed <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Some methods of the class aren't echoed <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit: version 0.51.0 Python version: 3.7.4 Using pip OS version: Manjaro Linux 18.1.3 Browser version: Chrome
